stories.original_headline: This AI spots dangerous blood cells doctors often miss
stories.original_summary: A generative AI system can now analyze blood cells with greater accuracy and confidence than human experts, detecting subtle signs of diseases like leukemia. It not only spots rare abnormalities but also recognizes its own uncertainty, making it a powerful support tool for clinicians.
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Mirror Aids Healers in Detecting Hidden Maladies!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a wondrous enchanted mirror. This magical artifact can gaze upon the vital humours of a patient, spotting subtle blights that even the most skilled healers might miss. It even knows when its own visions are unclear, making it a trusted guide for diagnosing mysterious maladies.

stories.original_headline: Scientists discover how the uterus knows when to push during childbirth
stories.original_summary: Childbirth depends not just on hormones, but on the uterusâ€™s ability to sense physical force. Scientists found that pressure and stretch sensors in uterine muscles and surrounding nerves work together to trigger coordinated contractions. stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Uncover Womb's Secret Rhythm for New Life!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Sages of the Healers' Guild have discovered a wondrous secret of the sacred womb. Beyond the flow of vital essences, the womb holds hidden magical threads and senses. These enchantments know just when to rhythmically guide new life into the world, ensuring a safe arrival.
